verbs.description: [ARG0: sf officials] [V: insist] [ARG1: sunset district tap water is safe despite pesticide concerns a san francisco woman who tested her tap water with a store - bought kit this week and got a positive reading for pesticides then posted the results to a social media site has prompted the city to step up water testing in the sunset district officials at the san francisco public utilities commission said tuesday for the second day in a row that municipal water is safe to drink and that] the extra staff brought in to police water systems on the city western [ARG1: edge was simply a precaution they acknowledged that] their own lapse in communication might have helped stir the online panic among neighbors as warnings to avoid the taps spread quickly through the sunset district after monday initial post about contaminants on nextdoor sierra nevada water american west kurtis alexander san francisco san francisco bay area tyler gamble bay area the chronicle general assignment reporter san francisco chronicle mel scardina public utilities commission sunset district

sf officials insist sunset district tap water is safe despite pesticide concerns [ARG0: a san francisco woman] [R-ARG0: who] [V: tested] [ARG1: her tap water] [ARGM-MNR: with a store - bought kit] [ARGM-TMP: this week] and got a positive reading for pesticides then posted the results to a social media site has prompted the city to step up water testing in the sunset district officials at the san francisco public utilities commission said tuesday for the second day in a row that municipal water is safe to drink and that the extra staff brought in to police water systems on the city western edge was simply a precaution they acknowledged that their own lapse in communication might have helped stir the online panic among neighbors as warnings to avoid the taps spread quickly through the sunset district after monday initial post about contaminants on nextdoor sierra nevada water american west kurtis alexander san francisco san francisco bay area tyler gamble bay area the chronicle general assignment reporter san francisco chronicle mel scardina public utilities commission sunset district
